content.text: This is the first post on my new blog. I'm excited to start sharing my thoughts and ideas with you. This entire site is powered by a cool workflow that converts Google Docs into blog posts.

Every time I want to write a new post, I just open a new Google Doc, write it out, and then use a special publishing page to automatically send it to my GitHub repository. The main page then finds the post and displays it here.

content.alt: A placeholder image for the first post

content.text: Now, it's time to start writing my first real post!
